description: Office furniture for the 5th Canadian Division Support Group (5 CDSG) Personnel Support Services.
full_summary:
=================================
# Office Furniture and Panneled Cubicles Supply

## Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** W0501-25M008/A
*   **Tender Reference Number:** cb-393-96650175
*   **Tender Status:** Expired

### Contract Description

The Department of National Defence invites tenders for the supply and installation of office furniture and panneled cubicles at the 5th Canadian Division Support Group (5 CDSG) Personnel Support Services located at 394 Champlain Avenue, Oromocto, New Brunswick.

### Contract Requirements

The contract requires the delivery and installation of the following items:

*   Workstations and office packages
*   Panel systems
*   Computer support furniture
*   Desking systems

### Commercial Groups

Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement are relevant commercial agreements.

### Geographical Scope

*   **Regions of Opportunity:** New Brunswick
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Oromocto, New Brunswick

### Contracting Entity Details

*   **Name:** Department of National Defence
*   **Address:**

    101 Colonial-By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Ann Marie MacDonald
*   **Email:** [annmarie.macdonald@forces.gc.ca](mailto:annmarie.macdonald@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (506) 432-3376

### Tenders and Attachments

Tenders must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buys platform and must include the requirements outlined in the attached tender document: [Office Furniture and Panels](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40899/w0501-25m008a-rfb---5-cdsg---pers-sp-svcs---office-furniture-and-panels_0.pdf)

Please ensure your submissions are compliant with government procurement procedures as outline in the tender document and your responses must be written in English or French. Suppliers may make one filing per submission. All questions about the bid should be sent as a bid inquiry to the contact details provided above.

Note: In the provided markup, I have made following changes

- Simplified the contract details to the essential points.
